name: cssman-cli
description: A library intended to generate design tokens from a style source
author: Dylan Archer <dylarcher@gmail.com> (@dylarcher)

scripts.bundle:types: echo 'Type declarations bundled by build script'
scripts.clean: npm run clean:dist && npm run clean:libs
scripts.clean:dist: npx rimraf dist lib test/coverage .vscode-test types bin
scripts.format: npx biome format --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && node build/fix-markdown-lines.js && npx markdownlint-cli --config .github/configs/.markdownlint-fix.json --fix .github/**/*.md ./docs/**/*.md ./src/**/*.md ./README.md ./CHANGELOG.md
scripts.lint: npx biome lint --write --config-path .github/configs/biome.json src && npx yaml-lint -c .github/configs/yaml-lint.yaml .github/**/*.yml
